title: Cannot Patch Client
body:
Left my client on during the day, got back from classes and received this error. Restarting the client does not remove the message. 

Pretty sure it's just (as it says) something to do with the servers, but just making sure the error code is reported.

replies.body: That 003 error code means that your network wasn't able to establish a solid connection with our servers. Hit up the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps on how you can adjust your **Port Forwarding and DNS settings** as those typically help. Make sure you go through the other steps as well to cover all your bases though.
